forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 29. Northwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 46. Northwest wind 9 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
As the night wraps its cool embrace around Boston, the skies remain mostly clear, offering a tranquil view that twinkles with the distant lights of the city. A brisk northwest wind whispers through the streets, carrying with it a reminder of the chill in the air, dipping down to a nippy 29 degrees. For those venturing out into the nocturnal expanse, a warm coat, perhaps layered with a scarf, would provide comfort against the gusts swirling about.

As dawn breaks into Sunday, the promise of sun brightens the day ahead, lifting spirits and warming faces. With clearer skies, the temperatures will rise, reaching a pleasant 46 degrees by midday. The winds may still flutter about, gentle but persistent, encouraging a brisk walk along the Charles or a peaceful moment in one of Boston’s parks. As the city awakens, it invites its dwellers to sip coffee at a local café, indulging in the slow pleasure of the morning. Dress comfortably in layers to appreciate the sunshine while staying prepared for the lingering chill, and embrace the hum of life that thrives in this historic city on a bright, blustery Sunday.
